channel.title: Setting up a mailing list database?
channel.description:
I'm interested in creating a database of address's, but i've never done anything remotely like this before so i'm having a time finding a starting point. does anyone have an idea of any free/cracked software that could setup a database that is highly manipulative ? if not, what are my other options before resorting to paying for a product.
The database i'd like to create would allow for any number of address's that could be grouped, and easily searched through.
Most importantly i would need to be able to export those address's to a separate document for viewing of the selected address's.
any help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Setting up a mailing list database?
item.dc:creator: @Renax Renax
item.description:
@Renax wrote:

alright, thanks i’ll take a look around at some php and we’ll see what i can come up with.

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up a mailing list database?

item.title: Setting up a mailing list database?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

It wouldn’t be hard to do something like this in PHP using a MySQL database, phpMyAdmin is very nice for quickly setting up databases(and offers a “convert to php” link on all queries).

Read full topic
